body_html:
I was expecting to leverage gcc but was warned by @meteorcloudy I might face issues if building TF.
I am aware bazel on Windows is experimental but decided to post the issue anyways to make the problem known for future improvements.

I am aware bazel on Windows is experimental but decided to post the issue anyways to make the problem known for future improvements.
body:
I was expecting to leverage gcc but was warned by @meteorcloudy I might face issues if building TF. 
I am aware bazel on Windows is experimental but decided to post the issue anyways to make the problem known for future improvements.
